sorry one more noob question. anywhere i can find out what MCC represents?
its ok we are here to learn. Merchants generally dont publish MCC or are willing to share but you can find a merchant (or shop) MCCusingheymax.aiwebsiteMCC = Merchant Category Code
Heymax is for visa mcc  mastercard might allocated mcc slightly different
Some Japan merchants do not follow what displayed by Heymax which is international standard.
looking at buying a watch from those reseller shops. haha
Heymax is also not 100 percent accurate  take it with a pinch of salt.
Most accurate is use the dbs method. Block the card  pay then use the digibot to verify
